clause_text: 5.5.1 Regulations for proposed Buffer Zone up to 2.5 km. aerial distance around Mahabaleshwar Panchgani Region. The following Regulations is applicable for the proposed Buffer Zone :- REGULATIONS FOR CONSERVATION ZONE IN SATARA REGION PART - I
